mapper.sql: FROM hybdMember a LEFT JOIN hybdSpaceMember b ON b.hymmSeq = a.hymmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.hyspSeq = #{hyspSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.hyplSeq ,a.hyplName ,a.hyplDefaultNy ,a.hyplDelNy ,a.hyplDate ,a.hyplDesc ,a.hyplMemberName ,b.hyspSeq FROM hybdPlan AS a LEFT JOIN hybdSpace AS b ON a.hyspSeq = b.hyspSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND b.hyspSeq = ${hyspSeq} AND a.hyplDelNy = 0
SELECT a.hymmSeq , a.hymmName , a.hymmId , a.hymmGenderCd , a.hymmNumber , a.hymmEmail , a.hymmDob , a.hymmDesc , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime
SELECT a.hyspSeq ,a.hyspName FROM hybdSpace AS a WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT c.hymmSeq ,c.hymmName FROM hybdSpaceMember AS a LEFT JOIN hybdSpace AS b ON a.hyspSeq= b.hyspSeq LEFT JOIN hybdMember AS c ON c.hymmSeq = a.hymmSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND b.hyspSeq = #{hyspSeq} AND a.hysmAcceptedNy = 1

SELECT a.hymmSeq , a.hymmName , a.hymmId , a.hymmDelNy , b.hysmSeq , b.hyspSeq , b.hymmSeq , b.hysmRoleCd , b.hysmDelNy , c.hyspSeq , c.hyspName , c.hyspDelNy
FROM hybdSpaceMember b LEFT JOIN hybdMember a on a.hymmSeq = b.hymmSeq LEFT JOIN hybdSpace c on c.hyspSeq = b.hyspSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND b.hysmAcceptedNy = '1' AND b.hysmExitNy = '0'

SELECT a.hyplSeq ,a.hyplName ,a.hyplDefaultNy ,a.hyplDate ,a.hyplDesc ,a.hyplMemberName ,b.hyspSeq FROM hybdPlan AS a LEFT JOIN hybdSpace AS b ON a.hyspSeq = b.hyspSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.hyplSeq = #{hyplSeq} AND a.hyplDelNy = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE hybdPlan SET hyplDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND hyspSeq = #{hyspSeq} AND hyplSeq = #{hyplSeq}
